titlestmt.titleproper: Presbyterian Union of New York records 1908-1949
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.unittitle: Presbyterian Union of New York records

bioghist.p: The Presbyterian Union of New York was a group formed with the object of encouraging a better acquaintance among the Presbyterians of New York City and its vicinity.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of minutes of meetings of the Executive Committee and minutes of annual meetings of the Union, 1908-1949. The minutes include treasurer's reports, lists of speakers at meetings, annual reports, programs from annual meetings and special events, and copies of the Union's constitution. The collection also includes printed reports from the 1920s.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Presbytery of New York City
